scripts.lint: pnpm --filter frontend lint && pnpm --filter backend lint
scripts.test: pnpm --filter frontend test run && pnpm --filter backend test
scripts.test:related: pnpm --filter frontend test run --changed && pnpm --filter backend test --onlyChanged
scripts.build: pnpm --filter frontend build && pnpm --filter backend build
scripts.precommit: pnpm format && pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test && pnpm build
